all appetizers main desserts

farmers cheese frangipane on buckwheat tart

ingredients

green buckwheat flour 280 g
unsalted butter (room temperature) 125 g
sugar 200 g
large egg 3 pcs
backing powder 1/2 tbsp
farmers cheese 150 g
almond flour 100 g
lemon juice 2 tbsp
pears
sliced almonds

steps

almond gluten free farmers cheese pie
